attributes.action: Pensions do not compare to the "Living Wage" but the cost of living is the same.
attributes.background: The cost of living is no different for someone pre-pension age as compared to a pensioner. How can a pensioner survive on less than half of the "Living Wage"

rejection.details:
Petitions need to contain a clear request for the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could submit a petition asking for the Government to increase the state pension to match the living wage.

Or you might want to sign one of the following petitions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113968
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113936
